function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possible spread of contagious diseases due to increased tourist activity in local communities","Impact":"Risk of widespread illness and public health crisis, potential damage to local populations and ecosystems","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety protocols for tourists and locals, provide access to healthcare facilities and resources","Technologies":"Health monitoring and tracking systems, sanitation and waste management technologies","People":"Local communities, tourists, wildlife","Owner":"Local authorities, healthcare providers, tourism operators"},{"Description":"Inadequate waste management leading to environmental contamination and health hazards","Impact":"Pollution of natural environment, risk of disease transmission, degradation of ecosystems","Mitigation":"Establish proper waste disposal and recycling systems, educate local communities on waste management best practices","Technologies":"Waste recycling technologies, sanitation systems, waste-to-energy technologies","People":"Local communities, wildlife, tourists","Owner":"Environmental organizations, local authorities, waste management companies"},{"Description":"Lack of income and control leading to development of illegal activities in the territory","Impact":"Risk of illegal activities affecting local communities and natural habitats, potential threat to public safety and security","Mitigation":"Create alternative sources of income through sustainable tourism, strengthen law enforcement and security measures","Technologies":"Surveillance and monitoring systems, community empowerment and education programs, sustainable tourism initiatives","People":"Local communities, law enforcement agencies, tourists","Owner":"Local authorities, tourism operators, law enforcement agencies"}]}
